players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie is dead, and I'm suspicious of Bob."
Bob: "Based on my investigation, Diana is the mafioso. I'm voting for Charlie."
Bob: "I've investigated Diana and found her to be the mafioso. I'm confident in my findings, but I'll keep an eye on everyone else as well."
Diana: "I'm innocent, I swear. Charlie was a threat to the group and needed to be taken care of."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
